Name: BOSS
Text: We are introducing some anti-protester measures today. Say hello to the security.

Name: COP
Text: Ready for service sir! And you kid, listen.

Name: COP
Text: We have boots on the ground today.

Name: COP
Text: I'm expecting some casualties, this is corporate security after all...

Name: COP
Text: but cut enough of my boys down and you'll pay dearly for it.

Name: COP
Text: Understood? Good, now let's go. Stay frosty!
